original_text: The chief leader of the Levites was Eleazar son of Aaron, the priest. He was appointed over those who were responsible for the care of the sanctuary.
korean_text: 제사장 아론의 아들 엘르아살은 레위인의 지휘관들의 어른이 되고 또 성소를 맡을 자를 통할할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: The chief leader of the Levites was Eleazar
who were responsible for the care of the sanctuary
